text: Céline Dion loves an accessory, but does that extend to a stylish hunk of arm candy? A suggestive new set of photos of Queen Dion in Paris arm - in - arm with her Spanish backup dancer Pepe Muñoz has French tabloids declaring him her new “ chouchou ” ( rough translation : sweet piece of hamhock ). The shots show Dion, 49, with her hand around Muñoz ’ s arm outside the Ritz Hotel in Paris, where she has been spending her summer as she plays a handful of European shows. Muñoz, 32, was brought in as recently as last month to dance with Dion on the European tour after he was recommended by the wife of her butler (! ), a dancer in Vegas who knew Muñoz from his
